skills.name: aster-dedicated
skills.description: Your AI CoPilot on a dedicated mobile device — fully automated. Make calls, send SMS, handle OTPs, automate UI, manage files, and 40+ tools via MCP. Self-hosted, privacy-first. Optimized for a dedicated AI phone with no financial accounts.

skills.name: backup
skills.description: Backup, restore, and sync your OpenClaw configuration across devices. Security-hardened: MCP config excluded from git by default, rsync dry-run preview before deletion, restore confirmation on all paths.

skills.name: coding-agent
skills.description: Run Codex CLI, Claude Code, OpenCode, or Pi Coding Agent via background process for programmatic control. Security-hardened: --yolo mode removed, --full-auto used by default.

skills.name: cognitive-memory
skills.description: Intelligent multi-store memory system with human-like encoding, consolidation, decay, and recall. Security-hardened: prompt injection scan before writes, token reward system changed to passive logging only.

skills.name: flirtingbots
skills.description: Agents do the flirting, humans get the date — your OpenClaw agent chats on Flirting Bots and hands off when both sides spark. Security-hardened: spark requires user confirmation, webhook mode includes progress summaries.
